ApplicationGuardUploadBlockingEnabled.description: Prevents files from being uploaded while in Application Guard

GPO.path: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Microsoft Edge\Application Guard\Application Guard Upload Blocking

ApplicationGuardUploadBlockingEnabled.requirements: Microsoft Edge version 96, Windows 7 or later
ApplicationGuardUploadBlockingEnabled.description-detailed:
Sets whether files can be uploaded while in Application Guard.

If you enable this policy, users will not be able to upload files in Application Guard.

If you disable or don't configure this policy, users will be able to upload files while in Application Guard.
